updates.title: Figma acquires AI-powered media generation company Weavy, expanding its AI capabilities beyond design into multimedia content creation for the Figma Weave brand integration.
Canva relaunches Affinity's creative suite as a unified all-in-one design platform, combining Designer, Photo, and Publisher into a single app to compete directly with Adobe's ecosystem.
ElevenLabs CEO predicts AI audio models will become commoditized over time, while the company maintains its current competitive advantage in voice synthesis technology.
Pinterest launches AI-powered shopping assistant with outfit recommendations, joining the growing trend of AI-enhanced e-commerce experiences for visual discovery platforms.
Nvidia becomes the first public company to reach $5 trillion market cap, highlighting the massive investor confidence in AI infrastructure and GPU technology for creative workflows.
